The demonstration on the Woodvale Road has been ongoing since last July when the Parades Commission banned Orangemen and bands from walking past the Ardoyne area on their return Twelfth of July route .
Mr Ford previously revealed the cost of policing the Twaddell protest had reached £5.45 m by the end of December last year .
